summary:
Computer hardware are the physical parts of a computer, like the brain (CPU), memory (RAM), and the house it all lives in (motherboard). It also includes things you connect to the computer, such as the screen (monitor), mouse, keyboard, and speakers. 

Hardware works with software, which are the instructions that tell the hardware what to do. Think of hardware as the tools and software as the instructions on how to use them.
title: Computer hardware
